name: A Home In The Dark
description:
A game about overcoming your own fears and finding a lost soul from your past.
Made for the #NotGGJ19 jam.

A lost soul in the night

You came back to your childhood's home for the holiday. Even though you don't quite recognize the surroundings, you instantly feel like you were a child again. But you hear whispers in the night. Your home feels safe and cozy, but it seems lacking of a presence that was there when you were a child...

Fight your inner demons in the dark

As you begin to follow the whispers of that unknown yet kind of familiar voice, you are attacked by scary creatures. Fight back or flee, use light to give you comfort outside of your home. But be warned : as you grow more and more scared, your strength might fail you. Your home is the only safe place out there.

Features
  • Move with either W,A,S,D or the arrows
  • Fight demons with spacebar or left click to damage them and knock them back
  • Randomly generated maps
  • Collect lanterns to improve light intensity around your home
  • Demons spawn less often where light is more intense

And some more that we prefer you discover :)

Known issues

As this game was made with limited time, you may encounter some issues, some of which are listed below (list is non-exhaustive) :

  • You may spawn outside of your home. Just restart the game, it shouldn't happen too often.

We are sorry if you encounter any issue. 

A game from debiantarte and Cyxo, two novice game developers from France. Any feedback will be appreciated !
